gist.headline: Sound check, one two
gist.blurb: We've added a dedicated endpoint to list all available audio models. Now you can programmatically see exactly which sonic tools are in the shed.
gist.summary: Added a `GET /audio/models` endpoint to the proxy server, enabling programmatic retrieval of available audio generation models.
gist.impact: Developers can now dynamically fetch the list of supported audio models and filter them based on API key permissions, matching the experience of text and image endpoints.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot in a cozy retro music shop or recording studio, looking at a selection of audio equipment (representing the models). The 'list' aspect is represented by the bee checking a clipboard or browsing a rack.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot in a tiny retro recording studio, checking a rack of glowing audio synthesizers and cassette tapes. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
